items.summary: Store a curated list of inspirational quotes in the backend and expose a function that deterministically returns a quote based on the current date (e.g., using a day-of-year index into the quotes array), so a different quote is shown each calendar day without any manual intervention.

Update the Dashboard's Today's Inspiration section to fetch the daily quote from the backend using the date-based query introduced in REQ-1, replacing any hardcoded or static quote. The displayed quote must update automatically each new day without requiring a page reload mid-session beyond normal daily visits.
